Row.Text: Renaissance Era unit with high range and low mobility, very good at dealing high damage to enemy units.
Due to the unit's high range and low mobility, it can pick off enemy vessels from afar. Its better to use this unit to pick off other flapships.
The Man O War was a large, highly immobilie, high ranged war ship that was mainly used as flag ships during wars. They were excellent at sieging and fighting large vessles.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Renaissance Era unit with high range and low mobility, very good at dealing high damage to enemy units.
